name: Be open to new experiences, even if they scare you.
description: Just take life one step at a time; scary things are sometimes the most worthwhile.

name: Know your worth.
description: You are not a prize to be won.

name: Look at the world from your own unique angle.
description: There's only one you, and your voice, opinion, and ideas matter. Let them be heard!

name: Go after what you want and never give up.
description: It might be exhausting and take longer than you want, but that makes it even sweeter when your dreams come true.

name: Practice kindness.
description: One small act can change someone else's life for the better.

name: Respect the planet.
description: The earth gives us so much, make sure you're giving something back.

name: Remember that sometimes all anyone needs is a friend.
description: There's no limit to what you can do.

name: Dream big and often.
description: Just take life one step at a time; scary things are sometimes the most worthwhile.

name: Listen to your heart.
description: Only you know what you want. Don't ignore that gut instinct!
